About the project

Bored Panda Adventures - BPA is created for the people who never settle down.

Having a Bored Panda NFT gives you exclusive rights to organise and participate in epic adventures across all continents. If you are dreaming of exploring the natural wonders and live unique experiences hosted by like-minded people, all you have to do is join the club by owning a BPA NFT. BPA club will get you privilidged access to one of a kind events that will make you escape from your day-to-day life. You will experience immersive activities designed to match every passion and skill level across different locations.

We are very excited to build community together that will share facinating stories, make stronger connections, seek challenges, have lots of fun and grow.

Here are a few of our characteristics:

{getTechnologies()}

  1. Accept challenges
  2. Learn from mistakes
  3. Support innovation
  4. Help each other

  6. Strive to be the best
  7. Be brave to take risk
  8. Build your future
